TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelimitedListTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出定向到文本编写器（如流编写器）或流（如文件流）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to a text writer, such as a stream writer, or to a stream, such as a file stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪输出采用由 属性指定的分隔符分隔的文本格式。The trace output is in a delimited text format that uses the delimiter specified by the property. 分隔符用于终止输出的行中的每个字段。The delimiter is used to terminate each field in a line of output. 例如，若要显示跟踪输出在 Microsoft Excel 电子表格中，你可能指定逗号 （"，"） 作为分隔符并创建一个以逗号分隔值 (CSV) 文件。For example, to display the trace output in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet, you might specify a comma (",") as a delimiter and create a comma-separated value (CSV) file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接口。 interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try`/ `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 你可以启用或禁用通过应用程序配置文件，然后使用已配置的应用程序中。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，你可以创建在代码中。Alternately, you can create a in your code. > [!NOTE] > 分隔通过使用以单词开头的名称的方法，将发出的文本`Trace`，如或。The delimits only text that is emitted by using the methods that have names starting with the word `Trace`, such as or . 跟踪数据发出的使用和方法不会被分隔。Trace data that is emitted by using the and methods is not delimited. 若要配置，编辑配置文件对应于你的应用程序的名称。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，你可以添加侦听器、 侦听器设置的属性或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove a listener. 应格式配置文件，如下面的示例中所示：The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果你尝试写入到正在使用的文件或不可用，文件名自动的前缀的 guid。If you try to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器旨在由方法的使用， ，和类来写入跟踪信息。Listeners are intended to be used by methods of the , , and classes to write trace information. 侦听器方法，除了构造函数，不应直接从应用程序代码调用。Listener methods, except for constructors, should not be called directly from application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性的值`name`参数，或为空字符串 ("") 如果`name`参数是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 属性可以用作到索引`Listeners`要以编程方式更改侦听器的属性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的属性具有名称"delimListener":For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 初始化写入指定文件并具有指定名称的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified file and has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化的新实例类指定的文件，指定路径上使用编码。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果该文件存在，则会附加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少可能出现异常，可能会导致输出无效的任何字符均替换"？"字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 属性设置为的值`name`参数，或为空字符串 ("") 如果`name`参数是`null`。The property is set to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 属性可以用作到索引`Listeners`要以编程方式更改侦听器的属性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码设置的实例的属性具有名称"delimListener":For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 获取或设置分隔列表的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter for the delimited list.
The delimiter for the delimited list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认分隔符是";"（分号）。The default delimiter is ";" (semicolon). 下面的配置文件示例演示的设置属性使用`delimiter`配置文件中的属性：The following configuration file example shows the setting of the property using the `delimiter` attribute in a configuration file: ```xml ```

span.span: is set to .
is set to an empty string ("").

summary.span: 返回分隔的跟踪侦听器支持的自定义配置文件特性。

span.span: Returns the custom configuration file attribute supported by the delimited trace listener.

returns.span: 包含单个值“delimiter”的字符串数组。

span.span: A string array that contains the single value "delimiter".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义特性是不从可以用来设置类的属性的基类继承的属性。A custom attribute is an attribute that is not inherited from the base class that can be used to set a property for the class. 自定义属性用于设置属性。The custom attribute for is used to set the property. 下面的配置文件示例演示了利用`delimiter`要设置属性属性：The following configuration file example shows the use of the `delimiter` attribute to set the property: ```xml ```

summary.span: 向输出文件或流中写入跟踪数据。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 标识输出时使用的名称，通常为生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 值之一，指定引发跟踪的事件类型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的数值标识符。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要向输出文件或流中写入的数据对象。

span.span: A data object to write to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 向输出文件或流中写入跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`参数都被编写为一个标头。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 数据对象转换为字符串使用`ToString`对象的方法。The data object is converted to a string using the `ToString` method of the object. `eventCache`数据写入其内容取决于值页脚属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.span: 值之一，指定引发跟踪的事件类型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

span.span: Writes trace information, an array of data objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`参数都被编写为一个标头。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 数据对象将转换为字符串使用`ToString`每个对象的方法。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. `eventCache`数据写入其内容取决于值页脚属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将事件跟踪信息写入输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes event trace information to an output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`参数都被编写为标头后, 跟`message`数据。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header, followed by the `message` data. `eventCache`数据写入其内容取决于值页脚属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、格式化对象数组和事件信息写入输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`参数都被编写为一个标头。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. `args`对象数组转换为字符串使用方法，并传递`format`字符串和`args`要跟踪的消息部分作为格式字符串数组。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache`数据写入其内容取决于值页脚属性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不应由应用程序代码调用。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 方法的调用， ，和类来写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.
